subject: Question
description_text:
I took this pedal off to adjust something and then I just suddenly noticed
this cable sticking out the front of the brake. What is this I don't
remember it when I got it and I fear that I unplug something on accident
that I shouldn't have

conversations.body_text: Hi Todd Alcott,    This connector links to the light strip module on the base plate. If you haven't purchased the base plate, you won't need to use this cable.
